climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: 🏆 The Original Award-Winning Acne Patch: Mighty Patch is a hydrocolloid sticker that improves the look of pimples overnight without the popping. Just stick it on, get some sleep, and wake up with clearer-looking skin.
⏱️ Results in 6-8 Hours: Absorbs pimple gunk thanks to our medical-grade hydrocolloid. Clinically tested and safe for all skin types.
🛌 All-Night Adhesion: Strong enough to stay on through a whole night of tossing, turning, and pillow-squishing. Easy to remove in the AM without redness or irritation.
✨ Blends Seamlessly into Skin: The thin sticker with a translucent matte finish keeps your pimple under wraps day or night. You might just forget you’re even wearing it.
🕊️ Peace-Of-Mind Design: Our hydrocolloid patches are UV sterilized, and allergy tested. Each box comes with 72 medium dots (12 millimeters) on easy-peel perforated sheets.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Believe the Hype Mighty Patch is the smarter way to handle pimples overnight. Stick the patch on and sleep (or chill). Wait for it to turn white. Peel it off (so satisfying) and voila! Pulls gunk out of pimplesNoticeably smaller, flatter zitsResults in 6-8 hours Don’t Pop It. Mighty Patch It. We know it’s tempting to pick and pop, but Mighty Patch effortlessly does the work for you—and safely. Shields skin against scabs and scarring caused by popping90% of participants agree Mighty Patch is a faster way to visibly shrink whiteheads overnight than traditional zit creamWake up to clearer-looking skin Safe for Sensitive Skin Mighty Patch is safe, gentle, and non-irritating for all ages and skin types. Made of medical-grade hydrocolloidChemical-freeAllergy tested

Allure Best of Beauty Award 2020 Allure Best of Beauty Award, Hero Cosmetics Mighty Patch Original, Best Acne Spot Treatment Into the Gloss “It's almost too good to be true. Adhere a tiny sticker—a translucent one that bystanders won't even notice—onto a pimple for anywhere up to eight hours...Now cheer because you have defeated yet another zit…”. Refinery29 "These whisper-thin acne patches draw out pus like no other and disappear completely under a dot of concealer." ** 2018 Beauty Innovator Award Winner **

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Invisible Little Helpers
reviews.reviewText: I knew they worked great for me but I work remote so let me retail you with a take of a person who interacts with the outside world. My husband went to pick up his sister and mom from the airport and met me at a restaurant for a late lunch. After having chatted for over an hour, he asks me if I notice anything about his face, I say no. He then proceeds to get within an in h of my face to point out he used one of my hero patches to hide a nasty pimple and hide it, it did! Secretive little sucker was nearly impossible to spot until later that night when it had done its duty and pulled some nasty white gunk from the depths of my husbands’ pore. That’s when I could tell it was there… love these so much more than those star pimple patches. These are effective, reliable, incognito pimple patches!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They were great
reviews.reviewText: An absolutely amazing daughter. I wish I had this when I was growing up instead of covering it in my mid 30s. They work amazingly well for whitehead as long as they are not internal. You can really see all the white that has been sucked out of your skin and it it hasn’t sucked everything out it freeze it up to the surface so if you give it a light squeeze, everything comes out afterwards. it’s also great because when it’s on it keeps you from picking up the pimple which has always been my biggest issue. It lets your pimple heal quicker and less irritation on the skin. Say goodbye to scars.I buy these religiously from my son was 13 and it works miracles.I do have to say that it is important that you apply to very clean skin, no lotion or retinol, or it won’t stick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure about these and didn’t think they would work very well but after using them they’re amazing. You have to wait until you have a full whitehead for it to be effective but if you wait for that, it does a wonderful job of taking out all the skin issues and leaves you with a clean and clear skin. Based on your skin tone it can be almost invisible so no one even knows it’s there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are amazing
reviews.reviewText: These are absolutely amazing. I repurchased them all the time. However, for them to be effective, you do have to kind of pop the pimple first and have it open and then slap the patch on for in order for to suck all the gunk out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They actually work
reviews.reviewText: My daughter and I use these all the time. They are pretty discreet so we are able to wear them throughout the day, and they stick so well we can wear them to bed without the fear of them falling off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received a fake version of the Hero Mighty Patches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars effective and easy
reviews.reviewText: these do a great job at what they do but I buy like 4 at a time on a prime day so i won't run out and it's cheaper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a must have product in my house
reviews.reviewText: I use this on any pimple that I get. I wash my face and put a patch on it. After the patch is on I moisturize my face and sleep with it on. When I wake up I either remove the patch or change the patch and wear it longer. I alway notice a difference by morning, the pimple is smaller, flatter and less red. My teenage son is even using them now. I highly recommend this product.
As advertised. Best on the market

I love these patches. They work really well to help clear my skin. I Pop one on before bed and wake up and remove. It’s that simple. For me I find they work, compared to other ones I have tried. They don’t irritate my sensitive skin. I highly recommend.
These are the best patches on the market. A must have for my teenage.
Not sure what is in these patches but it certainly does the trick! Great for removing blemishes overnight.Thanks for producing a great product!
